name: Loft is in the air
description:
This is the postcompo version of a game made in 72 hours for the #LDJAM 37. It adds a background music and more levels.

One-room loft is the new trend!!!

So as the best real estate agent in town, you can't let that opportunity pass. Wait! There are no more one-room lofts left to rent??

That won't stop you... You can perfectly turn any average flat into a shining one-room loft!

Play as the finest real estate agent in town and break all the walls you can find in those flats to turn them into one-room loft! Beware of the rats and the security cameras!

Earn some money by satisfying your customers, do the make over with style, find extra money and buy new abilities with all that cash you have!

IMPORTANT

You can only break the walls were they are already damaged (orange zigzags)

Controls:

Controller

Menu

      • Stick: Move
      • A: Select
      • X: Switch Map/Shopping list

Basic movement

      • Stick: Move
      • keep Up/Down pressed when not moving: Look up&down
      • A: Jump
      • Down+A : Drop (on furnitures and one-way platforms)
      • Up/Down+A on doors: Climb up/Climb down
      • X: Dash
      • X+Direction: Directional dash

Extra ability:

      • Y: Throw ninja suitcase
      • Down+Y : Place bomb suitcase

Keyboard

Menu

      • Arrows: Move
      • Z: Select
      • X: Switch Map/Shopping list

Basic movement

      • Arrows: Move
      • keep Up/Down pressed when not moving: Look up&down
      • Z: Jump
      • Down+Z : Drop (on furnitures and one-way platforms)
      • Up/Down+Z on doors: Climb up/Climb down
      • X: Dash
      • X+Direction: Directional dash

Extra ability:

      • C: Throw ninja suitcase
      • Down+C : Place bomb suitcase
